content.description: The writer wants to add information to the end of sentence 3 (reproduced below), adjusting the punctuation as needed, to better express the main claim of the passage.
content.question: Inspired by these efforts, a number of Mexican American artists turned to printmaking as a form of artistic expression.Which of the following choices best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: employing a multitude of techniques and drawing on a variety of aesthetic traditions
to celebrate the accomplishments of other Mexican American people around the country
to reflect the issues raised by the Chicano movement and as a means of cultural affirmation
aiming to educate the public about Mexican traditions within and outside the United States

content.answer: to reflect the issues raised by the Chicano movement and as a means of cultural affirmation

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Write a thesis statement that requires proof or defense and that may preview the structure of the argument.
